about_the_game:
Set in the distant Gordon System in the year 3001, Nebula Complex Survival is an open-world, story-driven survival game that plunges you into the hostile environment of Dylan-4. After a catastrophic crash landing in enemy territory, you must harness your wits, skills, and determination to explore, craft, and fight for your very existence until rescue arrives.

Explore the Untamed Wilds

Venture into the diverse and dangerous landscapes of Dylan-4. Gather vital resources, craft essential tools and materials, and adapt to the ever-changing environment. From dense forests to arid deserts, every biome offers unique challenges and opportunities.

Uncover the Secrets of the Past

As you navigate this uncharted world, you’ll come across the remnants of a once-active radio station, the only device powerful enough to send signals through the planet's magnetic field. Repairing and utilizing this station could be key to signaling for help and escaping Dylan-4.

Survive Against All Odds

Dylan-4 is teeming with threats, both natural and artificial. Face off against hostile wildlife, treacherous terrain, and the remnants of enemy forces who may not have entirely abandoned the planet. Craft weapons, build shelters, and use your ingenuity to overcome the myriad dangers that await you.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains realistic bloodshed, use of melee weapons and firearms, violence towards alien creatures and robotic characters.

name: Nebula Complex Survival

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Newsest Gen i3/Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: i7/Ryzen 7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 12 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space

short_description: Set in the distant Gordon System in 3001, Nebula Complex Survival is an open-world, story-driven game. After crash landing on Dylan-4, explore, craft, and fight for survival. Discover a crucial radio station to signal for help while facing natural and artificial threats. Can you survive?
